question: There is a mysterious number line on the wall. Skip count by 10s along the number line and fill in the empty boxes to unlock the door.
Next, skip count by 10s and fill in the blank boxes to reveal the hidden code.
To open the next door, complete the mysterious number line by skip counting by 10s. Fill in the blanks to reveal the code.
A faded number line appears on the wall. Skip count by 10s and fill in the missing numbers to unlock the next clue.
To find the key, complete the number line by skip counting by 10s. Fill in the blanks to reveal the location of the hidden key.
